document_data.name: Tanatha
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the Zakaran vizier|the priestess of Talos|Tanatha (priestess)}}
'''Tanatha of the Glittering Blades''' was the Chief Vizier of [[Mahabba]] in the [[Pantheist League]] of [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: As Chief Vizier, Tanatha served as the caliph's most trusted advisor.
document_data.History: Tanatha was a skilled [[farisa]] who served on several campaigns with Caliph [[Ma'mum al-Sahnan]].
document_data.Relationships: Tanatha was briefly married to Ma'mum and bore him three sons. Two of their sons perished in combat, but the third trained to become a [[moralist]] in [[I'tiraf]].
